title: JSON Schema for OLE responses for Locations
description: Constrains OLE Locations output by the OLE server; input restrictions are more limited

locationLevel.description: Specialization of the locationLevel to eliminate the need to specify 'code'

baseObject.json.description: Base definition for maintenance object objects in the API.

@id.description: This is the resource URI for the specific object

@context.description: Indicates the type of object; individual extending types may use 'pattern' to match a specific URI

code.description: A short(-ish) code used as an alternate (contextual) reference for the object

name.description: A human readable name for the object
